name: Symmetry (itch) (HackTrout)
description:
Rotate the world's reflection and even fuse the real world and the reflected together to solve mind bending puzzles! Follow me on twitter @HackTrout if you enjoyed the game! Details:

Made in 48 hours for the first Miziziz Jam! The condition was to use art pack made by Kenney which you can find here.

Music was obtained from zapsplat.com.

Controls:
  • A and D to move
  • Space to Jump
  • W to interact
  • Left and Right arrow keys to rotate the reflection
  • Enter to fuse the two sides together
